name: Boni+
description:
** RECOMENDED:  "F" KEY ==  FULLSCREEN **

Controls:

  • WASD or D-Pad to move.
  • "L" key or A button to jump
  • "K" key or X Button to shoot

Boni the skeleton is traveling across the Mexican "Dia de muertos", however, he needs to go across the spooky  Iztepetl cementery.

HELP HIM GET HIS SKELETAL BODY TO THE OTHER SIDE!!!}

Credits:

Everything but the music: @PistachoDuck

Music: "8 bit adventure" by David Renda
